definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Psychology, Memorial University of Newfoundland .
sentences.chinese: 這是紐芬蘭紀念大學心理學系的網站。

sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 這是國際理論與應用化學聯合會的網站。

sentences.english: Older singletons are using the sites as a way to find love.
sentences.chinese: 孤寡老人使用此類網站尋找真愛。

sentences.english: Are new products and services being offered that were not a part of the old site?
sentences.chinese: 還是提供的新產品和服務不屬於舊的網站的一部分？

sentences.english: Can you apply that outside of high-traffic Web sites?
sentences.chinese: 能否把這樣的方法應用到大規模流量網站之外的應用？

sentences.english: This web siter is incredible source for around.
sentences.chinese: 這個網站是不可思議的源泉左右。

sentences.english: The inclusion of any link to other websites does not imply endorsement by the Nestlé Group.
sentences.chinese: 將其他網站置於連結內不代表雀巢集團對其認可。

sentences.english: It might be their own products, or the products of other websites.
sentences.chinese: 這些也許是他們自己的產品，或者其他網站的產品。

sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特維斯集團尊重本網站訪問者的隱私。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您確信個人網站的可靠性後才能利用它們。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以創建表格收集訪問者對網站的評論。

sentences.english: You will be able to enliven your site in the direct meaning of this word.
sentences.chinese: 你將能夠搞活您網站中的直接意義，這兩個字。

sentences.english: On average, Habbos users spend about 39 minutes per visit to the site.
sentences.chinese: 平均來說，哈寶用戶每次花上39分鐘來瀏覽網站。

sentences.english: One of the best sites to find gas-related information is GasBuddy.com.
sentences.chinese: 便是一個你能獲得與汽油相關信息的最好的網站之一。

sentences.english: After hacker attack website is procurable, carry out " hang a horse " .
sentences.chinese: 當黑客攻擊網站得手後，便實施“掛馬”。

sentences.english: Even my preferred product is currently out-of-stock , I am still loyal to the website.
sentences.chinese: 即使我喜愛的商品暫時缺貨，我仍然會忠誠於此網站。

definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
network (computer, telecom)/Internet/Taiwanese term for 網絡|网络[wang3 luo4]
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
